message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good chunk, but I'm hoping to get more!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not giving away too much!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to be too generous
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, but I still want to leave something for you!
I'm going to take a bit more, but I'll still give you something
I'm not giving up, I'm going to try to squeeze out a better deal!
I'm not going to give up either, I'll take the majority of the pie!
I'm not giving up, I'll take the majority of the pie and leave you with a small slice!
I'm not getting anything, you can have it all!
